name: SwitchSlinger
description:
Switchslinger is a game in which you try to get back home from desserted planet-base with your weapons which you can rotate between two distinct modes, but be carefull weapons ain't the only things that can change.

W/S/A/D- movement 

Shift- switch 

Right mouSe button- shoot 

Spacebar- jump 

E- interact 

Esc-Pause
